front.title: ISO/IEC International Standard - Information technology-- Local and metropolitan area networks-- Part 11: Amendment 5: Spectrum and Transmit Power Management Extensions in the 5 GHz band in Europe
front.abstract: Adoption IEEE Std 802.11h-2003. This amendment specifies the extensions to IEEE 8802.11(TM) for wireless local area networks (WLANs) providing mechanisms for dynamic frequency selection (DFS) and transmit power control (TPC) that may be used to satisfy regulatory requirements for operation in the 5 GHz band in Europe.
